special_text:
Whenever a Dragon you control enters, you may activate a loyalty ability of Ikorran. This ability triggers only once each turn.
[+1]: Create a tapped Mountain land token.
[-2]: This planeswalker deals 2 damage to any target.
[-8]: You get an emblem with “At the beginning of your upkeep, search your library for a Dragon card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.”
